overview: GGM Stairlifts and scooters: buy in Italy chair and wheelchair stairlifts, electric mobility scooters, hoists, bath-lifts, rollators and aids for elderly and disabled people made by Handicare, stair climbers and crawlers. GGM Montascale the Italian lift company about passenger lifts, freight elevators and dumbwaiters, home lifts and vertical platform lifts, escalators. Free advices and quotations. Visit http://www.ggmmontascale.it for more informations.
